name: Wide Kyle: The Video Game
description:
the video game of the widest of kyles

Controls:

-Keyboard-

WASD - Forward, Backward, Left, Right

Arrow Left - Rotate left

Arrow Right - Rotate right

-Controller-

Left Stick - Forward, Backward, Left, Right

Right Stick - Rotate left and right 

This is an early access build of the game so expect bugs and missing things
